author: jfclere
msg: Add a test related to PR#43327.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1225 : Changed SimpleACLTest to use QpidTestCase so the failing test can be excluded. This change DOES NOT mean the test will run agains the exteranl brokers. The test explicitly shutsdown the QTC broker during the setUp and only runs InVM currently.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1256 : Initial commit of build creator tool. Documentation to appear on Wiki. (http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/qpid/Build+Creator)

author: ritchiem
msg: Stopped the broker closing the ProtocolSessions as this was causing the client to lock in Mina seemingly missing the notify for the CloseFuture and hangs indefinately
